title: Scorching heat drives India's gas-fired power use to multi-year highs in May
description: Sweltering heat and policy measures are driving a surge in gas-fired power use in India, with LNG imports set to sharply rise over the next two years. Gas-fired power generation doubled in April and May, impacting coal's share. India's LNG imports are forecasted to increase, driven by the power sector's growing demand for flexibility.
